caseTitle: Muhammad Riaz v. Muhammad Ramzan, etc
tagline: Discussion: (1) Principle of estoppel and approbation and reprobation. (2) Proof of Talb-i-Muwathibat & Talb-i-Ishhad (3) Article 129 of the Qanun-e-Shahadat, 1984 read with Section 27 of the General Clauses Act, 1897 with regard to presumption of service.
